Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2013, off C.C. Sabathia (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2013, off C.C. Sabathia (NYY)...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/16/2015 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,028,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Houston on 2/2/2016 (Going to HOU: CF Mike Trout. Going to LAA: 2B Joe Wendle, 1B Lewin Diaz, 2B Jose Altuve)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,864,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/18/2017 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
0/0/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,864,286 through salary arbitration...
9/1/2018: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $20,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2018, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2018, hitting .380 with 7 HR, 25 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 2 RBI against Milwaukee on 5/12/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2019, hitting .680 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/31/2019 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...

Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/17/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2021, hitting .423 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 4/22/2022 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...

Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2024, hitting .433 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 4/20/2024...

Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2026, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Traded from Arizona to Minnesota on 2/15/2027 (Going to ARI: P Florentino Maurice. Going to MIN: CF Mike Trout)...
